pages.text: $(li)The Sconce is a new kind of light source.$(br)$(li)Unlike the $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/torchs)Torches$(/l), this one which can not be washed away by water.
$(li)It exists a redstone lever variant called $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/sconce_lever)Sconce Lever$(/l).
$(li)This source light block can be turned off with water and splash water bottles.$(br)$(li)It can be lit up with Fire Charges, Flaming Arrows and Flint and Steel.
$(li)The Soul Sconce is just a new variant of the normal Sconces.$(br)$(li)The flames of the Soul Sconce have the blue color.
$(li)The Glow Sconce is just a new variant of the normal Sconces.$(br)$(li)The flames of the Soul Sconce have the yellow color.
$(li)The Ender Sconce is just a new variant of the normal Sconces.$(br)$(li)The flames of the Soul Sconce have the purple color.
